column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat|identity
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Does n’t it make you just want to sneeze ?
#Text=Pete was leaning against the wall , watching the street go by .
#Text=I pulled the bike to a halt , the front wheel pointing in his direction .
#Text=“ I think I ’ve got a fairy stuck up my nose . ”
#Text=“ S’ not true ! ” came a voice from inside the nose in question .
#Text=“ Hey ! Not bad that ! ” Pete said .
#Text=“ I did n’t see your lips move at all . ”
#Text=“ It ’s not a joke . ”
#Text=The itching was getting worse .
#Text=I pulled out a paper tissue .
#Text=“ Stop that now ! ” came the voice again .
#Text=“ You know I do n’t like it . ”
#Text=“ S’ not my fault .
#Text=You make me want to sneeze ! ”
#Text=And I did .
#Text=I inspected the crumpled paper .
#Text=Lots of yellow goo , but no fairy .
#Text=Pete looked at me with mild disgust as I eyed the handkerchief more closely .
#Text=“ You know that ’s pretty gross … ” he said .
#Text=“ Got any other brilliant remarks ? ” I said .
#Text=I held a finger up to my lips , and waved a hand to silence Pete ’s reply .
#Text=“ Are you still there ? ” I called .
#Text=“ No thanks to you ! ” came the little voice .
#Text=Pete looked at me sort of sideways .
#Text=“ Look , the first time was OK , but — ”
#Text=“ It ’s not a joke .
#Text=I ’ve really got something stuck up there .
#Text=I was riding on me bike and I thought I ’d swallowed an insect or something .
#Text=And then it started insulting me . ”
#Text=“ You ’re having me on , right ? ”
#Text=“ Pete !
#Text=Look at me .
#Text=If it ’s a trick , how do I do it then ? ”
#Text=Pete thought for a moment .
#Text=“ If it ’s real … Are n’t they supposed to have a pot of gold or something ?
#Text=And they have to tell you where it is if you catch them ? ”
#Text=“ That ’s leprechauns , idiot ! ” said the voice from my noise .
#Text=“ So what ’s the difference ?
#Text=Just give us the gold and we ’ll let you go … ”
#Text=“ We — ? ” I started .
#Text=He winked at me .
#Text=“ Oh , I ’m happy to stick around , ” came the voice .
#Text=“ It ’s noggins here who wants to get rid of me … ”
#Text=Suddenly I felt a violent pain in my nose , my eyes watered .
#Text=“ Owwww ! ” I howled .
#Text=“ See what I mean ? ” the voice shouted over my moans .
#Text=“ Perhaps you can use it in exams … ” Pete said , scratching his head .
#Text=“ You know , it could tell us all the answers . ”
#Text=“ Idiot !
#Text=If it yacks on like that in an exam , I ’ll get thrown out .
#Text=And probably locked up too . ”
#Text=“ Ca n’t it whisper ? ”
#Text=“ Perhaps I do n’t know the answers anyway ? ” said the voice .
#Text=“ Have you thought of that ? ”
#Text=“ Anyway , I do n’t want it in exams .
#Text=I just want it to go .
#Text=Out of my nose . ”
#Text=“ Ca n’t you just poke it out ? ”
#Text=“ With what ? ”
#Text=“ S’pose you ’ve already tried your finger … ”
#Text=“ Yes he has , ” the voice said .
#Text=“ And it was n’t pleasant I can tell you . ”
#Text=“ You see what it ’s like .
#Text=He ’s already making sarcastic remarks like that … ”
#Text=“ What if we put something in your nose to catch it , then ?
#Text=I do n’t know … A spider ? ”
#Text=“ No ! ” we both said at once .
#Text=“ Snap ! ” Pete said .
#Text=“ You both said the same thing at the same time , you ’ve got to make a — ” He hit his forehead with his palm .
#Text=“ That ’s it !
#Text=Three wishes !
#Text=When you catch a fairy , you get three wishes .
#Text=Hey you in there !
#Text=Is that right ? ”
#Text=“ You could see things like that … ” said the voice with resignation .
#Text=“ I wish you ’d get out of my nose , then ! ” I cried .
#Text=In a flash the fairy was out of my nose and gone .
#Text=And I ’m still waiting for my two other wishes .
#Text=THE END
#Text=Something a little lighter this week , I hope you enjoy it .

#Text=Once it got started , I realised that the idea must have been inspired by the title of Justine Larbalestier ’s How to Ditch Your Fairy , although it has nothing at all to do with that story at all .
#Text=All in all , my story feels very light .
#Text=But I think I needed something a little less dark , and there are some quite sombre tales coming up in the coming weeks .
#Text=See you then .
